general.name: Chilly Willy Early
general.description: How to get up to Chilly Willy without the use of Claw Clamber boots.

general.name: Shack Pack Skip
general.description: How to get the Jinjo and fish for Boggy in the hot water without using Shack Pack.

general.name: Hot Waterfall Jinjo Damage Boost
general.description: How to grab the Jinjo behind the waterfall without pillars.

cwkshots.name: Ice Wall Shot
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the ice wall to grab the Jiggy.

cwkshots.name: Ice Train Shot
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the entrance to Boggy's Igloo to grab the train station Jiggy.

cwkshots.name: Ice Train Shot (Pause Buffer Method)
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the ground beneath Boggy's Igloo using a precise pause timing to grab the train station Jiggy.

cwkshots.name: Icicle Grotto Cheato Page Shot
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the wall in Icicle Grotto to grab the Cheato Page.

outofbounds.name: Slit Clip
outofbounds.description: How to get the Colosseum Jiggy as solo Kazooie with a Clockwork.
